title: Pradhan Mantri Kisan Samman Nidhi (PM-KISAN)
description: ₹6,000 annually to eligible farmers in three installments
criteria: All landholding farmer families with cultivable land. Excludes taxpayers or individuals with income above taxable limits

language.hii: पात्र किसानों को सालाना ₹6,000 तीन किश्तों में।

title: Fisheries and Aquaculture Infrastructure Development Fund (FIDF)
description: Provides financial assistance for creating fisheries infrastructure.

eligibilityCriteria.incomeLimit: No income bar, but preference to small-scale fishers and cooperatives

title: Atal Bhujal Yojana
description: Sustainable groundwater management with community participation
criteria: Communities in selected water-stressed blocks. No income cap at individual level

language.hi: समुदाय की भागीदारी से भूजल प्रबंधन।

title: National Beekeeping & Honey Mission (NBHM)
description: Supports scientific beekeeping and honey production
criteria: All beekeepers and related FPOs. No income limit specified

language.hi: वैज्ञानिक मधुमक्खी पालन और शहद उत्पादन को बढ़ावा।

title: Madhya Pradesh State Farmers Welfare Scheme
description: Offers financial assistance to farmers for crop production
criteria: Registered MP farmers with annual family income less than ₹2 lakh

language.hi: कृषि उत्पादन के लिए किसानों को वित्तीय सहायता।

title: Soil Health Card Scheme
description: Soil cards to promote balanced fertilizer usage
criteria: All farmers eligible. No income restrictions

language.hi: मिट्टी स्वास्थ्य कार्ड से संतुलित उर्वरक उपयोग को बढ़ावा।

title: Kisan Credit Card (KCC) Scheme
criteria: Farmers involved in farming or allied activities with annual income under ₹1.5 lakh preferred for subsidy-linked interest

language.hi: किसानों को अल्पकालिक और दीर्घकालिक ऋण सहायता।

description: No description available

title: PM Kisan Maan-Dhan Yojana
description: Monthly pension of ₹3,000 for farmers after age 60
criteria: Small/marginal farmers aged 18–40 years with cultivable land up to 2 hectares and monthly income below ₹15,000

language.hi: 60 वर्ष के बाद किसानों को ₹3,000 मासिक पेंशन।

title: Sub-Mission on Agricultural Mechanization (SMAM)
description: Facilitates access to agricultural machinery for small and marginal farmers
criteria: Small and marginal farmers with income under ₹1.5 lakh/year prioritized for subsidy

language.hi: छोटे और सीमांत किसानों के लिए कृषि यंत्रीकरण तक पहुंच को बढ़ावा।

title: Mukhyamantri Krishi Ashirwad Yojana
description: Provides financial assistance for paddy, maize, and pulses farming

language.hi: धान, मक्का, और दालों की खेती के लिए वित्तीय सहायता।

eligibilityCriteria.incomeLimit: Annual family income should be below ₹1.5 lakh

title: Pradhan Mantri Krishi Sinchayee Yojana (PMKSY)
description: Aims to increase irrigation coverage to enhance crop production
criteria: Farmers in non-irrigated zones. No income restrictions

language.hi: कृषि उत्पादन बढ़ाने के लिए सिंचाई कवरेज में वृद्धि।

title: Pradhan Mantri Annadata Aay Sanrakshan Abhiyan (PM-AASHA)
description: Aims to support farmers' income by ensuring MSP on crops
criteria: Farmers growing MSP-declared crops. No income barrier

language.hi: फसलों पर न्यूनतम समर्थन मूल्य सुनिश्चित करने के लिए किसानों की आय का समर्थन।

title: Agriculture Infrastructure Fund (AIF)
description: No description available
criteria: Open to all farmers and FPOs. Income not a restricting factor but project viability is assessed

language.hi: उत्पादन के बाद प्रबंधन और सामुदायिक कृषि संपत्ति के लिए वित्त पोषण।

title: Paramparagat Krishi Vikas Yojana (PKVY)
description: Promotes organic farming with cluster-based approach
criteria: Any farmer interested in organic farming. No income limit specified

language.hi: क्लस्टर-आधारित तरीके से जैविक खेती को बढ़ावा।

title: Pradhan Mantri Krishi Sinchayee Yojana - Har Khet Ko Pani
description: Provides irrigation solutions to increase farm productivity

language.hi: कृषि उत्पादकता बढ़ाने के लिए सिंचाई समाधान प्रदान करता है

eligibilityCriteria.incomeLimit: No specific income limit; priority to small and marginal farmers

title: Small Farmers' Agri-Business Consortium (SFAC)
description: Promotes agribusiness ventures for small and marginal farmers.

language.hi: छोटे और सीमांत किसानों के लिए कृषि व्यापार योजनाओं को बढ़ावा देता है।

eligibilityCriteria.incomeLimit: Applicable to small and marginal farmers with low income

title: National Food Security Mission (NFSM)
description: Enhances rice, wheat, pulses, and coarse cereals production
criteria: Farmers growing targeted crops. No specific income limit

language.hi: चावल, गेहूं, दालों और मोटे अनाजों के उत्पादन को बढ़ावा।

title: Pradhan Mantri Fasal Bima Yojana (PMFBY)
description: Crop insurance against natural calamities with low premium
criteria: All farmers growing notified crops, regardless of income level

language.hi: प्राकृतिक आपदाओं के खिलाफ फसल बीमा।

title: Rashtriya Krishi Vikas Yojana (RKVY)
description: Promotes agriculture development through state-level interventions

language.hi: राज्य स्तर पर कृषि विकास को बढ़ावा।

title: Mahatma Gandhi National Rural Employment Guarantee Act (MGNREGA)
description: No description available

language.hi: छोटे और सीमांत किसानों के लिए कृषि व्यापार योजनाओं को बढ़ावा देता है।

eligibilityCriteria.incomeLimit: Applicable to small and marginal farmers with low income

title: Bhavantar Bhugtan Yojana
description: No description available
criteria: Registered farmers of Madhya Pradesh with no specified income cap

language.hi: बाजार मूल्य एमएसपी से कम होने पर किसानों को मुआवजा।

description: Promotes agricultural extension and modernization of farming techniques

language.hi: कृषि विस्तार और खेती की तकनीकों के आधुनिकीकरण को बढ़ावा देता है

title: Scheme 24

eligibilityCriteria.incomeLimit: No income limit; farmers from all income groups are eligible

title: Bhoomi Heen Kisan Mazdoor Yojana
description: Provides financial support to landless farmers and agricultural laborers

language.hi: भूमिहीन किसानों और कृषि श्रमिकों को वित्तीय सहायता प्रदान करता है

eligibilityCriteria.incomeLimit: Applicable to BPL families and landless laborers

title: National Mission for Sustainable Agriculture (NMSA)
description: Focuses on sustainable agriculture practices to combat climate change
criteria: Farmers adopting sustainable practices. No income limit set

language.hi: जलवायु परिवर्तन से निपटने के लिए सतत कृषि प्रथाओं पर जोर।

title: Rythu Bandhu Scheme
description: ₹5,000 per acre per season to farmers for both Rabi and Kharif crops
criteria: Farmers owning agricultural land in Telangana. No specific income limit, but institutional landowners are excluded

language.te: రబీ మరియు ఖరీఫ్ సీజన్లకు ప్రతి ఎకరానికి రూ.5000

title: Zero Budget Natural Farming (ZBNF)
description: Encourages chemical-free, low-cost farming practices
criteria: Farmers in Andhra Pradesh and Telangana with preference to low-income and small farmers

language.hi: रासायनिक मुक्त और कम लागत वाली खेती को बढ़ावा।

title: Rajiv Gandhi Kisan Nyay Yojana
description: No description available
criteria: Farmers in Chhattisgarh cultivating notified crops. No specific income limit, but must be small or marginal

language.hi: कृषि उत्पादन बढ़ाने के लिए किसानों को आर्थिक सहायता।
